ISSUE.TITLE: TimyMCE should not generate empty paragraphs
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION:
nopCommerce version: 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: The TimyMCE editor generates empty

tags. They are not valid and remove when the "HTML minification" setting is enabled. Please see https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/82470/nop-42-html-minify-issue So we should ensure that the editor adds ` ` if they are empty. For example, see a related discussion - https://community.tiny.cloud/communityQuestion?id=90661000000IfOcAAK

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4872 Added encoding the non-breaking space character into a TinyMCE named entity
